    <title>St. Louis Blues Win First Ever Stanley Cup!</title>
    <script src="script.js"></script>
    <h1>St. Louis Blues Win First Ever Stanley Cup!</h1>
    <image><img alt="London celebrates local connections as St. Louis Blues win Stanley ..." class="n3VNCb" src="https://shawglobalnews.files.wordpress.com/2019/06/bx156-613_2019_033947-1.jpg?quality=85&amp;strip=all" data-noaft="1" jsname="HiaYvf" jsaction="load:XAeZkd;" style="width: 433px; height: 308.259px; margin: 0px;"></image>
    <h1>It All Started In Free Agency</h1>
      <image><img alt="Blues make big splash on first day of free agency" class="n3VNCb" src="https://nhl.bamcontent.com/images/photos/299391976/1024x576/cut.jpg" data-noaft="1" jsname="HiaYvf" jsaction="load:XAeZkd;" style="width: 383px; height: 215.438px; margin: 0px;"></image>
      <p>July 1st, 2019 was the first day of free agency. The Blues added David Perron, and Tyler Bozak who were signed as free agents. The biggest move of the day however was the trade for Ryan O'Reilly.</p>
    <h1>Welcome Home Pat Maroon</h1>
      <image><img alt="Roller Hockey Alliance Hockey powered by GOALLINE.ca" class="n3VNCb" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/62IdU0P7-eC5Xn8lGIENYEed9OKC_NOn1e9RzSLL6U5QbljPXDeWNS63DrEMgl7kpWz6Ynx7AdVruL5MlAwaGhtvjtNU_QurpdgWjS__5yQVzcxMriZH3m4-8e4Q9VUsSJ2guPiW-8oaKXVb_M4" data-noaft="1" jsname="HiaYvf" jsaction="load:XAeZkd;" style="width: 383px; height: 266.232px; margin: 0px;"></image>
      <p>Pat Maroon who grew up in St. Louis became a Blue on July 10th when he took a lesser offer to come play for his hometown team. Not bad for a "roller hockey" kid!    
    <h1>Mike Yeo Fired As Head Coach</h1>
      <image><img alt="Yeo fired as coach of Blues, replaced by Berube on interim basis" class="n3VNCb" src="https://nhl.bamcontent.com/images/photos/302134324/1024x576/cut.jpg" data-noaft="1" jsname="HiaYvf" jsaction="load:XAeZkd;" style="width: 433px; height: 243.563px; margin: 0px;"></image>
      <p>19 games into the season the Blues were in almost in last place in the NHL. Mike Yeo was fired and his assistant Craig Berube was named the interim coach.</p>
    <h1>The Blues Were Dead Last in the NHL</h1>
      <image><img alt="Ortiz: Might be time to worry as Blues struggle again | St. Louis ..." class="n3VNCb" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," data-noaft="1" jsname="HiaYvf" jsaction="load:XAeZkd;" style="width: 433px; height: 277.842px; margin: 0px;"></image>
      <p>On January 3rd,2019 the Blues were dead last in the NHL standings. There was talk of trading key players in an effort to dimantle and start rebuilding for the next season.</p>

LOUIS IN 52 YEARS'" width="500" height="500"></div></a></image>
      <p>Jordan Binnington was the No.4 goalie on the Blues depth chart coming into the season and was even loaned out to the Boston Bruins farm team at one point. But on January 7th he started his first game for the Blues and recorded a shutout. His calmness, positive attitude, and competitive spirit are widely said to have contribured to the teams resurgence. </p>
    <h1>11 Game Franchise Record Win Streak</h1>
      <image><img src="https://media.nhl.com/site/asset/public/images/2019/02/BLUES_WIN_STREAK-16124103.png" style="height:auto !important;width:480px;" width="420"></image>
      <p>It started on January 23rd and extended for 11 games as the team moved up in the standings to become one of only 4 teams to make the playoffs after being in last place half way throught the season.</p>
    <h1>Rattle  the Rookie</h1>
      <image><img class="rg_i Q4LuWd" data-src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcS4GhzY7o5JkfZZR0c2m3UDsYM90orr4jOS-g&amp;usqp=CAU" data-lt="" jsname="Q4LuWd" width="240" height="180" alt="Who is this savage at the St. Louis and Winnipeg game? : hockey" src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcS4GhzY7o5JkfZZR0c2m3UDsYM90orr4jOS-g&amp;usqp=CAU"></image>
      <p>There are many ways to rattle a rookie, but not many times has there been a scenario when a tweet from 5 years prior is used to try and rattle someone. A Winnipeg blogger dug up an old tweet and tried to accuse the goaltender of being racist. The fans changed and booed but the rookie remained professional and poised. He dug into and sent the Jets to golf course.</p>
    <h1>Hometown Kid Wins Game 7 Thriller in Overtime</h1>
      <image><img alt="Blues do it! Maroon's goal gives them Game 7 win | Morning Skate ..." class="n3VNCb" src="https://bloximages.newyork1.vip.townnews.com/stltoday.com/content/tncms/assets/v3/editorial/c/5f/c5f4d130-c344-546f-95d1-30be6af19b55/5cd26343e494e.image.jpg?resize=1200%2C712" data-noaft="1" jsname="HiaYvf" jsaction="load:XAeZkd;" style="width: 433px; height: 256.913px; margin: 0px;"></image>
      <p>One of the hardest obstacles the team faced was the series against the Dallas Stars and fellow St. Louisan Ben Bishop who was the goaltenderfor the Stars. He played phenominal and kept his team in multiple games with his great play. It was tied when the hometown Maroon netted the game winner in overtime propelling his team to the next round.</p>
    <h1>Stanley Cup Champions</h1>
      <image><img alt="At last! The St. Louis Blues become first | St. Louis Blues ..." class="n3VNCb" src="https://bloximages.newyork1.vip.townnews.com/stltoday.com/content/tncms/assets/v3/editorial/e/a6/ea65c60f-b03c-5216-b837-46111f54701a/5d01dfd9e9e6b.image.jpg?resize=1200%2C800" data-noaft="1" jsname="HiaYvf" jsaction="load:XAeZkd;" style="width: 433px; height: 288.667px; margin: 0px;"></image>
      <p>The Blues had never won the Stanley Cup. The also had not even made it to the final round of the playoffs in 49 years. However it seemed as they were destined to win. They outplayed the Bruins in multple games but didn't play well in others. After 6 games it would come down to just one game. The Blues put on what many would say was their most complete team game. Binnington was amazing and only let in one goal. He could very easily have been the mvp. In the end the Blues won their first Stanley Cup and the city had a long awaited parade!</p>
